programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Painting / Paddington Finds Buried Treasure) S1 (6/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Painting / Paddington Finds Buried Treasure»Mrs. Brown can't find inspiration for her next art work so Paddington decides to help find her mojo! // Jonathan and Paddington dig up some broken pottery that turns out to be a statue made by Mrs. Brown. But who broke it?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Finds a Hobby / Paddington and the Stamp) S1 (2/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Finds a Hobby / Paddington and the Stamp»Paddington does not have a hobby like all of the Browns, but Mrs. Brown finds out what Paddington is good at. // Paddington gets his arm stuck in a post box after accidentally using Mr. Gruber's rare Penny Black stamp on his letter to Aunt Lucy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La dispute) S2 (43/52)
programme.desc: «La dispute»Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La balle rebondissante) S2 (48/52)
programme.desc: «La balle rebondissante»Peppa and George play with the ball until Suzie comes and they play tennis with it. But George doesn't like that. Fortunately, the friends come by and play a game of football. But a referee must be involved!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La panne de courant) S2 (47/52)
programme.desc: «La panne de courant»One day all the lights suddenly go out and Peppa's house is plunged into darkness. There has been a power cut. Peppa is surprised to find that even the television won't work without electricity. While the family wait for the electricity to come on again, Peppa and George have fun looking for a torch and thinking of games to play in the dark.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire de Papa Pig) S2 (50/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire de Papa Pig»Today is Daddy Pig's birthday, but he has to go to work. While he is away, Mummy Pig, Peppa and George prepare a special birthday surprise.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Les Trois Mousquemers) S6 (n°30)
programme.desc: «Les Trois Mousquemers»When a Gargoyle steals all the gifts and decorations for Countess Molly's surprise party, the French villagers call in the Three Guppeteers. But will the swashbuckling girls be able to swipe back all the presents in time for la grande fête?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Le Grand Joshini) S3 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Le Grand Joshini»Periwinkle is planning a magic show! The Amazing Joshini and YOU, are eager to perform the greatest magic trick the Blue's Clues house has ever seen! But which one? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La crise de rire de Magenta) S3 (n°15)
programme.desc: «La crise de rire de Magenta»Josh and Blue are pretending to be doctors around the house, giving silly checkups to friends, but one "patient" seems to have a curious condition. We'll play Blue's Clues to help find the cure!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (La trompette du Triton / Le coffre enchanté) S1 (17/21)
programme.desc: «La trompette du Triton / Le coffre enchanté»Santiago and crew must retrieve a powerful undersea artifact after it's stolen by Enrique. // Bonnie Bones transforms into a baby and it's up to the good pirates to change her back.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Comet Cupcakes) S2 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Comet Cupcakes»The crew help Capt. Sprinkles find a flower to make his special cupcakes but when Escarlata steals it they must get it back.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (The Present) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «The Present»Baby Shark goes undercover to figure out the perfect gift for Mommy Shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Captain Varech) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Captain Varech»As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Cranberry Cookies) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Cranberry Cookies»Tiny Chef bakes cookies to welcome a lady bug who moves into the neighborhood.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le concours de melon / La Pat'Patrouille sauve Bettina) S6 (3/26)
programme.desc: «Le concours de melon / La Pat'Patrouille sauve Bettina»Mayor Humdinger's plan to win the giant melon contest goes off the rails when his "melon" bounces away, causing chaos all over town! // When Farmer Al's truck gets stuck on a broken bridge, it's up to the pups to lower them to safety!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington fait de l'exercice) S2 (5/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington fait de l'exercice»It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park, Paddington however is not very fit so Mrs. Bird decides to train him!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le sentier de randonnée) S2 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Le sentier de randonnée»Suzie Sheep comes to play at Peppa's, together with her invisible friend Leo de Leeuw. Peppa has to get used to it, but soon she is playing Suzie's game, just like Papa and Mama Pig. Only George finds it difficult.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'ami imaginaire) S2 (27/52)
programme.desc: «L'ami imaginaire»Suzy Sheep has come to play with Peppa. Suzy has made up a pretend friend called "Leo Lion". Peppa cannot see Leo but Suzy announces that Leo likes roaring and he likes playing dressing up. Peppa decides that now she can see Leo. Even Mummy and Daddy Pig play along with the game. But Peppa's little brother George cannot see Leo and feels a bit left out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le correspondant) S2 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Le correspondant»Peppa and George are visiting their big cousin Chloé and her new baby brother, Alexander. Baby Alexander is too little to play games, but Peppa and Chloé have a great idea;.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Kite) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «The Kite»While Anna and Froga are playing with their kite, it gets stuck in the tree. Anna and Froga race to Ron's for help, but when the three friends arrive at the apple tree, their kite and all the apples are missing!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Nap) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Nap»Anna and her friends decide they should all take a nap to be in shape for their midnight pyjama party, but no one knows the best way to get to sleep and they each offer their own unique way to do it!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La grande fête de Blue) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «La grande fête de Blue»Show us your dance moves! Josh and Blue are having a dance party, and we play Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite dance. As we groove to find clues, we learn Magenta's favorite dance and help Bunny Jo learn a new dance!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le Super-secoueur / La ferme en folie) S8 (16/24)
programme.desc: «Le Super-secoueur / La ferme en folie»Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire and shakes up Adventure Bay, even threatening to rock the Lookout off its foundation. // Farmer Al has a wild dream that the Paw Patrol must rescue he and Yumi when his animals start acting like humans.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand) S9 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand»Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (L'attaque des drones / Pluie de slime) S1 (14/15)
programme.desc: «L'attaque des drones / Pluie de slime»Steel's automated delivery drones create chaos in the city and forest. Kai has to disable the drones real quick! // When Sir Steel's Slime Machine starts shooting slime everywhere, Bobbi has to pilot the Deer Squad Rescue Carrier to save the city.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La danse de l'espace / Le croqueur de diamant) S2 (n°206)
programme.desc: «La danse de l'espace / Le croqueur de diamant»Everyone is grooving to Stu and Safia's dance song, so the Deer has to stop Steel's satellite from broadcasting hypnotic dance signals.// To impress Lady Fluffpot, Sir Steel tries to get his hands on Jade's precious Rainbow Diamond!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin) S1 (9/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin»Mr Brown has forgotten to get Mrs Brown a Birthday present, Paddington decides to hold a surprise party. // Judy does not like Violin lessons so hides from Ms Potts. Paddington takes up the challenge. Watch out ears!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Cranberry Cookies) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Cranberry Cookies»Tiny Chef bakes cookies to welcome a lady bug who moves into the neighborhood.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...»Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange) S1 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange»While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Super Requin / La Forêt de Varech) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Super Requin / La Forêt de Varech»Inspired by their favorite TV show, She-Shark, Baby Shark and William set out to be superheroes. // After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Shark Strength) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Shark Strength»When a game of coral pins bowling gets out of fin, Baby must learn to control his shark strength.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Bicycle) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «The Bicycle»Bubu impresses his friends with a brand new bike he won in a contest. He encourages everyone else to ride it, Anna discovers why: Bubu doesn't know how to ride a two-wheeler!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Le ukulélé) S1 (10/78)
programme.desc: «Le ukulélé»Anna, Froga and Ron make up a song that Anna plays on her ukulele. But they accidentally end up breaking her cherished instrument in half! Ron and Froga do everything they can to stop Anna from finding out, finally they need to confess their mistake.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Quiet Game) S1 (n°76)
programme.desc: «The Quiet Game»After talking so much to her plants, Froga decides to save her voice by playing THE QUIET GAME. When she lays out the objective that her friends need to try to make her talk - it becomes a fun challenge for the gang to get her to crack.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Impatient Christopher) S1 (n°27)
programme.desc: «Impatient Christopher»Christopher can hardly wait for his birthday tomorrow, he delivers invitations to his friends, he tries to figure out what present they are preparing for him. Christopher learns that sleeping is the fastest way for tomorrow to come sooner!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Statue of Friendship) S1 (n°28)
programme.desc: «The Statue of Friendship»Anna is inspired to create a statue of Froga but she runs out of clay. On her search to find more, she and her friends agree to each make their own special statues out of different materials. The best statue to build is one they build together!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Froga's Hat) S1 (n°29)
programme.desc: «Froga's Hat»Froga finds a sun hat she thought she lost forever and organizes a celebration picnic! But when the precious hat gets stained with jam, Froga's friends try to fix it - only making things worse. In the end, Anna's solution is the best of all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le grenier de Mamy et Papi Pig) S2 (42/52)
programme.desc: «Le grenier de Mamy et Papi Pig»Peppa and George go to play with Grandma and Grandpa Pig, who are cleaning up the attic. They want to throw everything away, but what Grandma wants to get rid of, Grandpa doesn't want and vice versa. Even Peppa and George can't figure it out!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Vive le camping) S2 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Vive le camping»The whole Peppa's class goes to the school camp! Great fun of course and also a bit exciting. Especially at night when they hear strange noises. Fortunately, Mrs. Gazelle is there with the Bing Bong Song.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'armoire à jouets) S2 (44/52)
programme.desc: «L'armoire à jouets»Peppa and George have so many toys that they no longer fit in their cleaning basket. That's why Mama Pig decides to buy a toy cabinet with the computer. But then the cupboard has to be put together, and Papa Pig is not very handy ... Hajeto!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Capitaine Papa Pig) S2 (46/52)
programme.desc: «Capitaine Papa Pig»Peppa and Suzy Sheep are best friends. But one day they have a quarrel, over a game of cards and decided they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up. When they finally say "sorry" to each other they realise that they will always be the best of friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les avions en papier) S3 (50/52)
programme.desc: «Les avions en papier»Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing - because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper airplanes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire d'Edmond l'éléphant) S3 (51/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire d'Edmond l'éléphant»Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La plus grande flaque de boue du monde) S3 (52/52)
programme.desc: «La plus grande flaque de boue du monde»Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Cave Barbapapas) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «The Cave Barbapapas»The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil»The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Amis à grande vitesse) S3 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Amis à grande vitesse»Blaze and Pegwheel the Pirate have teamed up for the ultimate treasure hunt! Together they must find three keys to unlock a special chest. But Crusher's sailing the high seas too, and he'll do anything to get the treasure first!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Gasquatch) S1 (14/20)
programme.desc: «Gasquatch»"Blaze and AJ are deep in the woods when they discover and befriend a mud-loving monster truck named Gasquatch. Now, they must set out on an epic adventure to bring their new friend to Mud Fest... the muddiest party of all time.".

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Lonesome Walrus / Pups Save the Hummy Gummies) S8 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Lonesome Walrus / Pups Save the Hummy Gummies»Everybody loves Helga Humdinger's Hummy Gummy treats, causing Mayor Humdinger to get jealous and steal them all.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Stop a Big Leak / Pups Save a Baby Anteater / Pups Save a Hatch Day / Pups Save the Munchie Mobile) S8 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Pups Stop a Big Leak / Pups Save a Baby Anteater / Pups Save a Hatch Day / Pups Save the Munchie Mobile»The Pups rescue Francois from a water tower geyser. // The Pups rescue a baby anteater stuck on a bucking RoboHorse. // The Pups rescue Ace and her special delivery for Chickaletta's party. // The Pups rescue Mr. Porter and his stranded Food Truck.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La fontaine mystérieuse / La soirée des lumières disco) S2 (n°17)
programme.desc: «La fontaine mystérieuse / La soirée des lumières disco»Who has put a new fountain in Crystal Lake which is against Park Rules? And it's upsetting Fish Hook! // Sir Steel thinks the deer have stolen Steel Tower's lights, so decides to take theirs with his new Light Sucker!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Fin de partie) S2 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Fin de partie»Lady Fluffpot hates mini-beasts - and Sir Steel creates MEGA-beasts that the Deer squad must deal with.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Painting / Paddington Finds Buried Treasure) S1 (6/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Painting / Paddington Finds Buried Treasure»Mrs. Brown can't find inspiration for her next art work so Paddington decides to help find her mojo! // Jonathan and Paddington dig up some broken pottery that turns out to be a statue made by Mrs. Brown. But who broke it?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Finds a Hobby / Paddington and the Stamp) S1 (2/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Finds a Hobby / Paddington and the Stamp»Paddington does not have a hobby like all of the Browns, but Mrs. Brown finds out what Paddington is good at. // Paddington gets his arm stuck in a post box after accidentally using Mr. Gruber's rare Penny Black stamp on his letter to Aunt Lucy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La dispute) S2 (43/52)
programme.desc: «La dispute»Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La balle rebondissante) S2 (48/52)
programme.desc: «La balle rebondissante»Peppa and George play with the ball until Suzie comes and they play tennis with it. But George doesn't like that. Fortunately, the friends come by and play a game of football. But a referee must be involved!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La panne de courant) S2 (47/52)
programme.desc: «La panne de courant»One day all the lights suddenly go out and Peppa's house is plunged into darkness. There has been a power cut. Peppa is surprised to find that even the television won't work without electricity. While the family wait for the electricity to come on again, Peppa and George have fun looking for a torch and thinking of games to play in the dark.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire de Papa Pig) S2 (50/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire de Papa Pig»Today is Daddy Pig's birthday, but he has to go to work. While he is away, Mummy Pig, Peppa and George prepare a special birthday surprise.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Les Trois Mousquemers) S6 (n°30)
programme.desc: «Les Trois Mousquemers»When a Gargoyle steals all the gifts and decorations for Countess Molly's surprise party, the French villagers call in the Three Guppeteers. But will the swashbuckling girls be able to swipe back all the presents in time for la grande fête?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Le Grand Joshini) S3 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Le Grand Joshini»Periwinkle is planning a magic show! The Amazing Joshini and YOU, are eager to perform the greatest magic trick the Blue's Clues house has ever seen! But which one? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La crise de rire de Magenta) S3 (n°15)
programme.desc: «La crise de rire de Magenta»Josh and Blue are pretending to be doctors around the house, giving silly checkups to friends, but one "patient" seems to have a curious condition. We'll play Blue's Clues to help find the cure!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (La trompette du Triton / Le coffre enchanté) S1 (17/21)
programme.desc: «La trompette du Triton / Le coffre enchanté»Santiago and crew must retrieve a powerful undersea artifact after it's stolen by Enrique. // Bonnie Bones transforms into a baby and it's up to the good pirates to change her back.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Comet Cupcakes) S2 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Comet Cupcakes»The crew help Capt. Sprinkles find a flower to make his special cupcakes but when Escarlata steals it they must get it back.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (The Present) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «The Present»Baby Shark goes undercover to figure out the perfect gift for Mommy Shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Captain Varech) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Captain Varech»As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Cranberry Cookies) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Cranberry Cookies»Tiny Chef bakes cookies to welcome a lady bug who moves into the neighborhood.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le concours de melon / La Pat'Patrouille sauve Bettina) S6 (3/26)
programme.desc: «Le concours de melon / La Pat'Patrouille sauve Bettina»Mayor Humdinger's plan to win the giant melon contest goes off the rails when his "melon" bounces away, causing chaos all over town! // When Farmer Al's truck gets stuck on a broken bridge, it's up to the pups to lower them to safety!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington fait de l'exercice) S2 (5/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington fait de l'exercice»It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park, Paddington however is not very fit so Mrs. Bird decides to train him!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Sleepover) S2 (n°51)
programme.desc: «Sleepover»Peppa is going for a sleepover at Zoë Zebra's house. Suzy Sheep, Rebecca Rabbit, Candy Cat and Emily Elephant are all coming to the sleepover too. The girls are are too excited to go to sleep. They stay up playing games and having fun. They play songs on a piano, have a midnight feast and take it in turns to tell a story. At last they feel sleepy. They all snuggle up in their sleeping bags and fall asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les étoiles) S2 (49/52)
programme.desc: «Les étoiles»George loves space and when he needs to sleep, he turns on his space mobile. Peppa doesn't understand that until Daddy Pig tells her about the stars. And when she gets to look through the telescope at Grandpa Pig, Peppa is over ... the space is super!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Travailler et s'amuser) S3 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Travailler et s'amuser»When Peppa and Suzy learn that grown ups must work all day, they decide to play at working in a store. But they quickly get tired of it.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Cuddle Toy) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «The Cuddle Toy»Christopher is sad because he lost his cuddly toy so Bubu gives him his to use. But when Christopher looses that one too, it's a desperate search for missing cuddlies until Anna saves the day!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Mosquito) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «The Mosquito»Froga is petrified of a pesky mosquito, so her friends try everything they can think of to chase it away: they dance, fidget, make loud noises and even try to befriend it. When Bubu activates his homemade stink bomb launcher, it causes such a stink!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres»The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. // The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La fête costumée de Blue) S1 (19/20)
programme.desc: «La fête costumée de Blue»Everyone's dressed up in silly costumes for our BIG costume parade, but we don't know what costume Blue wants to wear! As we play Blue's Clues to figure it out, we help Shovel make a truck-tastic costume and skidoo into Jill's puppet theater play!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost) S9 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost»When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. // Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that it's not easy to help a ghost make new friends.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Capitaine Métal / Grosse chaleur) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Capitaine Métal / Grosse chaleur»Whilst some of the Deer Squad down with flu, Sir Steel tries to become a superhero with disastrous results. // Sir Steel "borrows" water from Crystal Lake for his Water Park in the city, but things soon go wrong!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La course aux rebonds / Qu'est-ce qui ne va pas, Lola ?) S2 (n°207)
programme.desc: «La course aux rebonds / Qu'est-ce qui ne va pas, Lola ?»It's Deer Squad to the rescue when Stu and Safia bounce off to space on their super bouncy mega trampolines./ A bad mood crystal causes Lola and many animals to become unusually grumpy!Jade has to help Deer Squad to restore joy around Central Forest.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Flies a Kite / Paddington the Detective) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Paddington Flies a Kite / Paddington the Detective»It's a windy day and Jonathan wishes to play kite with his dad. Since Mr. Brown is stuck at home, Paddington takes Jonathan to the park.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Snap Pea Stir-Fry) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Snap Pea Stir-Fry»Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Pour maman / Barbacarambolage) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Pour maman / Barbacarambolage»The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Boris / Né pour être sauvage) S1 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Boris / Né pour être sauvage»The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (William, le grand reporter / Au lit, Baby Shark) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «William, le grand reporter / Au lit, Baby Shark»While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter. // Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La journée des meilleurs amis / Le mystère de l'aquaskate) S1 (n°17)
programme.desc: «La journée des meilleurs amis / Le mystère de l'aquaskate»Baby Shark tries to give William the best Best Fin-ship Day ever.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Friendship Journal) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Friendship Journal»Anna decides to make a scrapbook to celebrate Friendship, where each try to come up with something special enough to deserve the first page in her "friendship journal.".

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Hide and Seek) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Hide and Seek»Anna and her friends are outside playing Ron's favorite game, Hide-and-Seek! Anna is the Seeker and quickly finds Froga, Christopher and Bubu. When the friends work together to try to find Ron, they realize he's found the best hiding spot of all.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Anna's Horse) S1 (n°30)
programme.desc: «Anna's Horse»Anna joins her friends to a game of riddle. Not only can she not "neigh" like a horse, she can't even make a loud sound. Bubu helps Anna with a Horse toy that makes the perfect "neigh" sound- perfect plan until they lose control of the toy!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Secrets Box) S1 (n°31)
programme.desc: «The Secrets Box»Froga is discussing the notion of secrets with Christopher. She can't keep secrets as they are a burden for her. Anna makes a secrets box where all the friends put their secret inside to feel better!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Bubu's Robot) S1 (n°32)
programme.desc: «Bubu's Robot»Bubu is understandably thrilled when he discovers his old toy robot that he converts into the FIX-IT-UP 5000. Anna, Froga, and Christopher are so impressed with his new fixer-upper robot, Bubu begins to think his friends like his robot more than him!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Froga's Choice) S1 (n°33)
programme.desc: «Froga's Choice»Froga can't decide which boots to wear for today's group photo with her friends. Anna, Ron, and Bubu try to help her decide, but it makes her decision-making more difficult!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camping-car) S3 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le camping-car»Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Vacances en camping-car) S3 (6/52)
programme.desc: «Vacances en camping-car»Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le compost) S3 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Le compost»Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Richard le lapin vient jouer) S3 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Richard le lapin vient jouer»Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, and Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa! The boys and girls don't want to play the same games, but they all like jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Patata-Parc) S4 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Patata-Parc»Peppa and her family visit a new theme park that has a vegetable theme.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La nouvelle maison) S4 (2/52)
programme.desc: «La nouvelle maison»In this episode, Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see the home that he designed and Mr. Bull and his crew are building. They will help Mr. Bull and be surprised when they find out who their new neighbours are.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le match de basket) S4 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Le match de basket»Peppa and her friends learn to play basketball, and their coach is Daddy Pig. He will teach them the rules- how to bounce the ball, tackling,... and in the end, they will play a game against a bigger, and older team.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Kittens) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «The Kittens»Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'arbre de Barbapapa / L'anniversaire des barbabébés) S1 (1/52)
programme.desc: «L'arbre de Barbapapa / L'anniversaire des barbabébés»It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Pilotes en péril) S3 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Pilotes en péril»Crusher has to compete against Blaze and Watts and therefore decides to cheat. He sends his opponents's drivers away into a big bubble. Blaze and Watts do everything they can to save their drivers and win the race.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Les monster rangers) S1 (15/20)
programme.desc: «Les monster rangers»"Blaze and his friends have joined the Truck Rangers, a scouting club where trucks earn badges for their accomplishments. But when Crusher's selfish scouting lands everyone in a heap of trouble, Blaze must race to the rescue!".

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Liberty Meets a New Friend / Pups Save the Pup Pup Boogie Contest) S9 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Liberty Meets a New Friend / Pups Save the Pup Pup Boogie Contest»Liberty mistakenly brings a bear into town, thinking it's someone's pet. She must fix her mistake and rescue Chickaletta. // Francois' hot-air balloon goes out of control before the Pup Pup Boogie Contest. The Pups, with Liberty, race to the rescue.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest) S9 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest»With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Cosmic Circus / A Hole Lot of Trouble) S2 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Cosmic Circus / A Hole Lot of Trouble»Sir Steel's circus takes Lady Fluffpot out of this world, can the Deer Squad bring her back to earth safely? // Bobbi gets carried away while digging for ground nuts and puts the forest and its residents in real danger.
